original_text: But you Israelites, Jacob's descendants, you did not call to me to help you. You became tired of serving me. But you Israelites, Jacob's descendants, you did not call to me to help you. You became tired of serving me. But you Israelites, Jacob's descendants,
korean_text: 그러나 야곱아 너는 나를 부르지 아니하였고 이스라엘아 너는 나를 괴롭게 여겼으며

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희 이스라엘 사람들, 야곱의 자손들아

sentences.original_text: you did not call to me to help you
You became tired of serving me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나를 섬기는 것을 피곤하게 여겼으며
그러나 너희 이스라엘 사람들, 야곱의 자손들아
